ygData.msgSnippet: Isn t the robe just anoher piece of clothing????   You should be able to trade and/or buy them anywhere from anyone . . . 1 other thing . . . is the trip to
ygData.messageBody:
Isn't the robe just anoher piece of clothing???? You should be able to
trade and/or buy them anywhere from anyone . . .

1 other thing . . . is the trip to Euridine from FREEPORT dangerous?? If I
stay on the road??

-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
